nodes.name: Module

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initialises the Module by setting publisher addresses,
     and reading all available system module information
@dev Modifier to allow function calls only from the Governor.
nodes.name: onlyGovernor

nodes.documentation:
@dev Modifier to allow function calls only from the Governance.
     Governance is either Governor address or Governance address.
nodes.name: onlyGovernance

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow function calls only from the ProxyAdmin.
nodes.name: onlyProxyAdmin

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to allow function calls only from the Manager.
nodes.name: onlyManager

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns Governor address from the Nexus
@return Address of Governor Contract

nodes.documentation:
